snippet.title: Fantasy Town coming soon in your mobile device
snippet.description:
Build the town of your dreams!
Every day is an exciting adventure in Arsendal.
Tommy, Frike, Max and many more magical friends are looking forward to helping you harvest your dreams! Available on iOS and Android devices in 2022. Learn more: https://www.fantasy-town.com

Features:
🏡 Build your dream town by utilizing resources however you wish and placing structures wherever you want.
🌾 Produce and Trade: Plant crops, harvest produce, and engage in trade to keep your city prosperous and your citizens happy.
✈️ Explore and Travel: You and your brave citizens are freely able to explore the world and discover hidden secrets and exciting adventures.
⚔️ Protect what is yours: Evil trolls will do their best to destroy your city and terrorize your people. Build defenses and repel their relentless attacks to keep your citizens safe.
💛 Play Together: Invite new friends to join you, or take part in whimsical mini-games with fellow players.

#FantasyTown #mobilegame #mobilegames #androird #ios #games #mobile #multiplayer #gamer #video #YouTube #streamer #videos #gameplay
